{"fixed_xml":"<ITEM>6. Bey Herrn Haag an der Augustinergasse sind zu verkauffen: <BIBL><TITLE>Prideaun A. und N. Testam</TITLE>, in einer Connex. mit der Völker-Historie, <PLACE>Berlin</PLACE> <YEAR>1725</YEAR>. <VOLUME>4. 1I. Tom. 1. Vol. 2</VOLUME> <PRIZE>Cattenburg</PRIZE></BIBL> <BIBL><TITLE>Sapientia Mos. de Vita & Scriptis Mosis contra Deistas</TITLE>. <PLACE>Amst.</PLACE> <YEAR>1737</YEAR>. <FORMAT>4.</FORMAT></BIBL> <BIBL><TITLE>Bibl.</TITLE> <VOLUME>8r. 70.</VOLUME> <AUTHOR>Interpp. Reineccii</AUTHOR>, <PLACE>Lips.</PLACE> <YEAR>1737</YEAR>. <FORMAT>8vo.</FORMAT></BIBL> <BIBL><TITLE>Bibl. Hebr.</TITLE> von <AUTHOR>punctata Leusdenii</AUTHOR>, <PLACE>Frf.</PLACE> <YEAR>1694</YEAR>. <FORMAT>12.</FORMAT></BIBL> <BIBL><AUTHOR>Seldenus</AUTHOR> <TITLE>de Diis Syris</TITLE>. <PLACE>Lips.</PLACE> <YEAR>1692</YEAR>. <FORMAT>8.</FORMAT></BIBL> <BIBL><AUTHOR>Gottschedens</AUTHOR> <TITLE>critische Dichtkunst</TITLE>, <PLACE>Leipzig</PLACE> <YEAR>1737</YEAR>. <FORMAT>8vo.</FORMAT></BIBL> <BIBL><AUTHOR>Bödickers</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Grundsätze der Deutschen Sprach</TITLE>, <PLACE>Berlin</PLACE>, <YEAR>1729</YEAR>. <FORMAT>8vo.</FORMAT></BIBL></ITEM>","number_of_corrections":10,"explanation":"I fixed tag structure and garbled characters. Changes made:
1) Inserted a missing closing </BIBL> for the Sapientia entry (it previously contained a nested <BIBL>). 
2) Replaced garbled place/words with plausible originals: "Augustinerga\u221a\u00fc" → "Augustinergasse"; "V\u221a\u2202lcker" → "Völker"; "B\u221a\u2202dickers" → "Bödickers"; "Grunds\u221a\u00a7tze" → "Grundsätze".
3) Removed a stray garbled token ("\u221a\u2020") that followed the first VOLUME element.
4) Normalized several format abbreviations containing garbled characters to the common bibliographic form "8vo." (three occurrences).
5) Escaped an ampersand in the Sapientia title ("&" → "&") to produce well-formed XML.
Overall: corrected nesting and tag closure, fixed encoding artifacts to readable characters, normalized format abbreviations, and ensured the XML is well-formed. Counted fixes above: 10."}

parsed.explanation:
I fixed tag structure and garbled characters. Changes made:
1) Inserted a missing closing </BIBL> for the Sapientia entry (it previously contained a nested <BIBL>). 
2) Replaced garbled place/words with plausible originals: "Augustinerga\u221a\u00fc" → "Augustinergasse"; "V\u221a\u2202lcker" → "Völker"; "B\u221a\u2202dickers" → "Bödickers"; "Grunds\u221a\u00a7tze" → "Grundsätze".
3) Removed a stray garbled token ("\u221a\u2020") that followed the first VOLUME element.
4) Normalized several format abbreviations containing garbled characters to the common bibliographic form "8vo." (three occurrences).
5) Escaped an ampersand in the Sapientia title ("&" → "&") to produce well-formed XML.
Overall: corrected nesting and tag closure, fixed encoding artifacts to readable characters, normalized format abbreviations, and ensured the XML is well-formed. Counted fixes above: 10.
